name: PERSONALISED Cycling Art Print: Customisable Name, Race Number, Hair, Eye and Bike Colour
description:
PERSONALISED Cycling Art Print: Customisable Name, Race Number, Hair, Eye and Bike Colour.

Many cyclists dream of being the World Road Race Champion. Great riders including Bernard Hinault, Greg LeMond and Eddy Merckx all managed to attain this ultimate cycling accolade, here's our somewhat easier route to achieving it!

Taken from our original illustration; this giclee art print depicts a rider wearing the rainbow jersey, which is worn by the World Road Race Champion, or 'Champion du Monde' as they say in France.

The great thing about this print is that you can customise it by making different choices from the following options: 

1. HAIR COLOUR
Blonde, Brown, Dark Brown/Black, Grey or Ginger 

2. EYE COLOUR
Blue, Brown, Brown/Black, Grey or Green 

3. BIKE COLOUR
Red, Blue, Green, Yellow or Orange 

4. RACE NUMBER
This could be a favourite rider’s number, a lucky number, birthday, anniversary etc.
 	
5. TEXT
You can choose a name, name & surname or nickname, with or without the title: ‘Champion du Monde’ (see pictures for examples)

This print would make a unique personalised gift for a cycling mad friend, loved one, or of course as a treat for yourself!

All you have to do is take a look at the pictures, which include illustrated instructions along with some examples, then make your choices to create your unique personalised cycling print.

When you’ve placed your order, simply click the ‘contact’ button at the top of the screen and email us with your five customised choices.

Your finished design will be printed with pigment inks onto smooth, archival acid-free paper, creating a beautiful high quality art print.

This print measures 10 x 10 inches square (25.4 x 25.4 cm) and will fit any 10 x 10 inch frame which are readily available. It also looks great in a 12 x 12 inch frame with a mount/matt (not included) 

Your print will be carefully wrapped in acid-free tissue paper and packed in a sturdy cardboard tube, to ensure that when shipped it reaches you in tip top condition.

Sold unframed.

© gumo 2013. All Rights Reserved

name: Classic French Cycling Terms Art Print in Blue
description: Classic French Cycling Terms Art Print in Blue We love all things cycling; including the Classics, the Grand Tours and all the evocative and exciting paraphernalia that goes with it. Taken from our original illustrations, this giclee art print depicts various terms used as part of common French cycling terminology, including: 'contre la montre' (time trial) and 'une musette' (feed bag) etc. This print would make a lovely gift for your cycling mad friends, family, or as a treat for yourself! It is printed with pigment inks onto smooth archival acid-free paper, which creates a beautiful high quality art print. The print measures 30 x 40cm (12 x 16 inches approx) fits a standard sized frame and would look good mounted (matted) too! Your print will be carefully wrapped in acid free tissue paper and packed in a sturdy cardboard tube, to ensure that it reaches you in tip top condition. Sold unframed. The print would look fab hung with our other Classic French Cycling Terms Print (see photo) click here to view © gumo 2013. All Rights Reserved

name: Classic Tour de France Jerseys, Cycling Print
description: Classic Tour de France Jerseys, Cycling Print We love all things cycling, particularly the Spring Classics, Grand Tours and all the evocative paraphernalia that goes with it. This giclee art print is taken from our original illustration of four classic cycling jerseys (les maillots du tour de france) as worn by some of the top riders in the Tour de France; Eddy Merckx, Lucien Van Impe, Phil Anderson and Laurent Fignon. This print would make a great gift for your cycling mad friends, family or as a treat for yourself! It is printed with pigment inks onto smooth archival acid-free paper, which creates a beautiful high quality art print. The print measures 30 x 40cm (12 x 16 inches approx) fits a standard sized frame and would look good mounted (matted) too! The print would look fab hung with our Classic French Cycling Caps Print (see last photo) click here to view Your print will be carefully wrapped in acid free tissue paper and packed in a sturdy cardboard tube, to ensure that it reaches you in tip top condition. © gumo 2012. name: Cycling Art Print, Classic Cycling Caps Print (Large)
description:
Cycling Art Print, Classic Cycling Caps Print (Large)

We love all things cycling; particularly the Spring and Autumn Classics, the Grand Tours and all the evocative paraphernalia that goes with it.

This giclee art print is taken from our original illustration of fifteen classic cycling caps (or les casquettes cyclistes as the French might say!) This print would make a great gift for your cycling mad friends, family or as a treat for yourself!

It is printed with pigment inks onto smooth archival acid-free paper, creating a beautiful high quality art print.

The print measures 50 x 70 cm (27.5 x 19.5 inches approx) and fits a standard size frame from ikea etc.

Your print will be carefully wrapped in acid-free tissue paper and packed in a sturdy cardboard tube and as this print is printed to order, we use a trackable mailing service to ensure it reaches you safely and in tip top condition.

Sold unframed.

© gumo 2013. All Rights Reserved

name: World Road Race Championship Cyclists, Peloton Cycling Print
description:
World Road Race Championship Cyclists, Peloton Cycling Print

We love all things cycling; particularly the Classics, Grand Tours and all of the evocative paraphernalia that goes with it.

Taken from our original illustration; this giclee art print depicts a typical scene containing a group of cyclists in close formation (or 'peloton' as the French would say!) The jerseys represent many of the National Teams that you might see battling it out for medals at the World Road Race Championships.

This print would make a great gift for your cycling mad friends, family or just as a little treat for yourself.

It is printed with pigment inks onto smooth matt archival acid-free paper, creating a beautiful high quality art print.

The print measures 50 x 23cm (19¾ x 9 inches approx) fits a standard sized frame (available from Ikea) and would look good mounted (matted) too!

Your print will be carefully wrapped in acid free tissue paper and packed in a sturdy cardboard tube, to ensure that it reaches you in tip top condition.

Sold unframed.

© gumo 2013. All Rights Reserved

name: Broom Wagon Print in Red
description:
Broom Wagon Print in Red

We love all things cycling; particularly the Classics, the Grand Tours and all the evocative paraphernalia that goes with it.

This giclee art print is taken from our original illustration of a classic french broom wagon 'la voiture balai'. The Citroen H Van's role was to follow behind the Tour de France 'sweeping up' all the injured, sick or exhausted cyclists along the way. This fun print would make a great gift for your cycling mad friends, family or as a treat for yourself!

The print would look fab hung with any of our 8 x 8 cycling prints see last photo.

It is printed with pigment inks onto smooth archival acid-free paper, which creates a beautiful high quality print.

The print measures 20.3 x 20.3 cm (8 x 8 inches approx) fits a standard sized frame and would look good mounted (matted) too!
